name: Marble Run - Race
description:
Marble Run - Race with other Marbles in Marble run racing game, defeat your opponents by passing them and different obstacles, avoid enemies and don't fall off the edge.
Physic's based game in a form of Marble Runner.
Marble Run Race is free mobile game
Knock enemies from the ground and become winner!
Game is suitable for adults and kids or better said for all ages.
Play the game and remember how it was to be a kid with marbles in your hands, it had to be a hobby.
But don't play Marble game like Netflix show did for Squid Game :)
Use your imagination and have some fun!
Level designed Tracks are fun and engaging.
Game can feel like playing 8 ball but also at some tracks you need to hit centre of the hole like it's a golf.
If you are 8 ball or a golf fan this game might also be interesting to you as love for balls is mutual
The tracks are designed to be fun and engaging but move out of place and you will lose the ground.
There are several mechanics and obstacles that you will need to learn in order to become marble masters.
There's a wheel that lifts the balls up in a circular motion. There's also a wooden lift that lifts balls up the stairs. Your inventions depend only on you and your imagination.
Also make sure to increase VOLUME!


- Complete 1000 challenges
- Rank up by gathering XP
- Collect 50 all the coins
- Collect daily rewards
- Unlock 15 tracks
- Compare your high score with players worldwide on leaderboard
